item.title: 特朗普的媒体公司股票在纳斯达克上市前跳涨
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的媒体和技术公司在宣布与一家空头公司合并两年多后，于周二收盘前在纳斯达克上市，股价大涨近 20%。【原文：Shares of Donald Trump's media and technology company jumped nearly 20% before the bell on Tuesday in the run-up to their Nasdaq debut after more than two years since its merger with a blank-check firm was announced.】

item.title: 与麦当劳合作走向全国后，Krispy Kreme 股价大涨
item.description: 周二，Krispy Kreme 的股价在盘前交易中最高飙升了 23%，因为该公司和麦当劳表示，他们计划到 2026 年底在这家快餐巨头的美国餐厅中提供 Krispy Kreme 的甜甜圈。【原文：Shares of Krispy Kreme surged as much as 23% in premarket trade on Tuesday after the company and McDonald's said they plan to provide Krispy Kreme's donuts across the fast-food giant's U.S. restaurants by the end of 2026.】

item.title: 福特重申年度核心利润展望
item.description: 福特汽车周二重申了其年度核心利润展望。【原文：Ford Motor reaffirmed its annual core profit outlook on Tuesday.】

item.title: 贝莱德的芬克谈美国退休危机，宣布推出 "LifePath Paycheck
item.description: 贝莱德首席执行官拉里-芬克（Larry Fink）敦促政府和私营部门确保美国人有足够的钱退休，并表示这家全球最大的资产管理公司将在下个月推出一款产品来解决这一问题。【原文：BlackRock CEO Larry Fink has urged the government and the private sector to ensure Americans have enough money to retire and said the world's largest asset manager would launch a product next month to address the issue.】

item.title: 基因治疗制造商蓝鸟公司因会计错误重报 2022 年财务数据
item.description: 基因治疗生产商蓝鸟生物周二表示，由于会计差错，公司计划重报 2022 年以及 2022 年和 2023 年前三个季度的财务报表。【原文：Gene therapy maker bluebird bio said on Tuesday it plans to restate its financial statements for 2022 and for each of the first three quarters of 2022 and 2023 following accounting errors.】

item.title: 香料生产商麦考密克因销量稳定、价格上涨而实现季度业绩增长
item.description: 麦考密克公司周二公布的第一季度销售额和利润超出市场预期，原因是在通胀持续高企的情况下，消费者对其高价香料和调味料的需求依然强劲。【原文：McCormick beat market expectations for first-quarter sales and profit on Tuesday, as consumer demand for its high-priced spices and seasonings held amid sticky inflation.】

item.title: Viking Therapeutics 公司称其实验性药片在早期研究中减轻了体重
item.description: 维京治疗公司（Viking Therapeutics）周二表示，在一项早期试验中，该公司生产的实验性片剂有助于减轻患者的体重，而且在研究中被证明是安全有效的。【原文：Viking Therapeutics said on Tuesday its experimental tablet helped reduce weight in patients in an early-stage trial and was shown to be safe and effective in the study.】

item.title: 投资者为北美公司提交的气候决议数量创历史新高
item.description: 本周二的一项新统计显示，今年迄今为止，北美公司年会上共提交了 263 项与气候相关的股东决议，创下了历史新高。【原文：A record 263 climate-related shareholder resolutions have been filed so far this year for annual meetings of North American companies, a new tally showed on Tuesday, with proponents tailoring their wording to gain support.】

item.title: 丰田官方表示，计划到 2025 年量产电池 Hilux 皮卡车
item.description: 日本丰田公司泰国分公司总裁周二表示，该公司计划在 2025 年底前量产电池电动 Hilux 皮卡车。【原文：Japan's Toyota plans to mass-produce a battery electric Hilux pickup truck by the end of 2025, the president of its Thailand unit said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国在世贸组织就 "歧视性补贴 "问题与美国展开争端
item.description: 中国常驻世贸组织代表团周二表示，中国已在世界贸易组织（WTO）启动针对美国的争端解决程序，以维护中国在电动汽车行业的利益。【原文：China has initiated dispute settlement proceedings against the United States at the World Trade Organization (WTO) to safeguard its interests in the electric vehicle industry, the Chinese permanent mission to the WTO said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 雷诺高管表示，正与合作伙伴就回收电池进行深入洽谈
item.description: 法国汽车制造商雷诺公司的一位高管表示，该公司正在与潜在合作伙伴就从废旧电动汽车电池中提取和回收锂及其他金属进行深入讨论，以寻求重新利用更多的战略原材料。【原文：French automaker Renault is in advanced discussions with potential partners to extract and recycle lithium and other metals from used electric vehicle batteries, a company executive said, as it seeks to reuse more of the strategic raw materials.】

item.title: 储蓄可能不是欧洲经济战的超级武器
item.description: 在欧洲寻求与经济竞争对手抗衡的过程中，政客们认为他们拥有一种秘密武器：尚未开发的公民储蓄。【原文：As Europe seeks to hold its ground against economic rivals, politicians think they have a secret weapon: the untapped savings of its citizens.】

item.title: 联合包裹服务公司预测 2026 年收入高于预期
item.description: 美国联合包裹服务公司（United Parcel Service）周二预测，2026 年的综合收入将好于预期，因为该公司正在努力积极削减成本并抢占市场份额。【原文：United Parcel Service forecast better-than-expected 2026 consolidated revenue on Tuesday, as it works to aggressively cut costs and capture market share.】

item.title: 尽管遭到抗议，匈牙利仍不会重新实施乌克兰蜂蜜进口禁令
item.description: 尽管蜜农提出抗议，称来自乌克兰的廉价蜂蜜压低了价格，并有可能使他们破产，但匈牙利不会重新出台禁止从乌克兰进口蜂蜜的禁令。【原文：Hungary will not reintroduce a ban on honey imported from Ukraine despite demands by honey farmers who have protested saying cheap honey from Ukraine pushed down prices and threatens to drive them out of business.】

item.title: 独家报道美国立法者要求FDA就检查马斯克的Neuralink公司一事做出答复
item.description: 一位参与卫生政策制定的美国立法者向美国食品和药物管理局询问，为什么在允许埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的神经链接公司（Neuralink）对其设备进行人体试验之前，没有对该公司进行检查。【原文：A U.S. lawmaker involved in health policy has asked the Food and Drug Administration why it did not inspect Elon Musk's Neuralink before allowing the brain implant company to test its device in humans.】

item.title: 早间竞标：三月市场平静，第一季度渐行渐远
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 超级大盘股和芯片股反弹，期货上涨
item.description: 周二，美国股指期货上扬，多数大盘股和芯片股上涨，同时投资者准备好在复活节长周末休市的这一周里等待更多数据，以评估美联储的利率路径。【原文：U.S. stock index futures ticked up on Tuesday as most megacap and chip stocks advanced, while investors readied for more data to assess the Federal Reserve's rate path in a week curtailed by the Easter long-weekend break.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：SK 海力士计划在印第安纳州投资 40 亿美元
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周二报道，作为英伟达（Nvidia）的供应商，韩国芯片制造商 SK 海力士计划投资约 40 亿美元，在印第安纳州西拉法耶特（West Lafayette）建造一座先进的芯片封装厂。【原文：South Korean chipmaker SK Hynix , an Nvidia supplier, is planning to invest roughly $4 billion to build an advanced chip packaging facility in West Lafayette, Indiana, the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 聚焦：可可价格危机迫在眉睫，好时和梦迪尔兹豪赌复活节
item.description: 在可可价格飙升威胁其利润、购物者对高价格望而却步之际，好时、蒙迪艾尔和其他糖果制造商正在采用促销手段，推出更多的复活节非巧克力食品，如饼干奶油兔子。【原文：Hershey , Mondelez and other confection-makers are employing promotions and pitching more non-chocolate Easter treats like cookies 'n' cream bunnies at a time when soaring cocoa prices threaten their profits and shoppers balk at high prices.】

item.title: 官员称中国商飞宽体飞机 C929 已进入 "详细设计阶段
item.description: 中国国有飞机制造商中国商飞公司的一位高管周二表示，该公司的首架宽体喷气机正处于 "详细设计阶段"，此前该喷气机的机身制造商曾报告说，其目标是在2027年9月之前交付首架机身部分。【原文：Chinese state-owned planemaker COMAC's first wide-body jet is in its "detailed design stage", an executive said on Tuesday, following a report from the jet's fuselage manufacturer aiming to deliver the first fuselage section by September 2027.】

item.title: APT31：全球网络间谍活动背后的中国黑客组织
item.description: 美国和英国对一家与中国国家支持的黑客组织 APT31 有关联的公司和个人提出指控并实施制裁。【原文：The United States and Britain filed charges and imposed sanctions on a company and individuals tied to a Chinese state-backed hacking group named APT31 that they allege engaged in a sweeping cyber espionage campaign.】

item.title: 印度 SpiceJet 公司 9100 万美元和解后将拥有 13 架庞巴迪 Q400 飞机，股价飙升
item.description: 印度廉价航空公司 SpiceJet 周二表示，该公司与加拿大出口发展局（EDC）达成了价值约 9100 万美元的债务清偿协议，从而获得了加拿大贸易融资机构资助的 15 架庞巴迪 Q400 飞机中 13 架飞机的所有权。【原文：Indian budget carrier SpiceJet said on Tuesday it agreed with Export Development Canada (EDC) to settle liabilities worth around $91 million, allowing it to take ownership of 13 of 15 Bombardier Q400 aircraft financed by the Canadian trade finance agency.】

item.title: 随着美国经济的腾飞，Flutter 预计 2024 年盈利将增长 30
item.description: 全球最大的在线博彩公司 Flutter 周二表示，由于其快速增长且市场领先的美国品牌 Fanduel 的业绩增长了四倍，该公司预计今年的核心利润将跃升约 30%。【原文：Online betting giant Flutter expects its core profit to jump by around 30% this year thanks to a four-fold increase at its fast-growing and market leading U.S. brand Fanduel, the world's largest online betting company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国业绩强劲，Fevertree 年度利润符合预期
item.description: 英国滋补品生产商 Fevertree Drinks 公布的年度利润符合预期，这主要得益于其美国市场的强劲表现，以及该地区产量的增加抵消了玻璃制造成本上升带来的通胀压力。【原文：British tonic maker Fevertree Drinks posted an annual profit in line with estimates, buoyed by a robust performance of its U.S. market and increased regional production to offset inflationary pressures due to elevated glass-making costs.】

item.title: 日本央行可能没有市场想象的那么鸽派
item.description: 消息人士称，在结束负利率之后，日本央行已经放弃了鸽派的前瞻性指引，转而采用更加 "依赖数据 "的政策审议方法，这为近期再次提高借贷成本敞开了大门。【原文：The Bank of Japan has ditched its dovish forward guidance in favour of a more "data-dependent" approach to policy deliberations after ending negative rates, sources say, keeping the door open for another near-term hike in borrowing costs.】

item.title: 特斯拉将为客户提供一个月的驾驶辅助技术试用期
item.description: 据特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）和公司网站称，特斯拉将向美国现有客户和新客户提供为期一个月的驾驶辅助技术 "全自动驾驶"（FSD）试用。【原文：Tesla will give a one-month trial of its driver-assist technology Full Self-Driving (FSD) to existing and new customers in the United States, according to Tesla CEO Elon Musk and the company's website.】

item.title: 欧洲 日元下滑唤醒打盹的人民币
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 消息人士称，中国国家主席习近平将于周三会见美国企业高管
item.description: 据三位知情人士透露，中国国家主席习近平将于周三在北京会见美国商界领袖，这是继他11月在旧金山与美国投资者共进晚餐之后的又一次会晤。【原文：China's President Xi Jinping will meet with American business leaders in Beijing on Wednesday, according to three sources with knowledge of the matter, in a follow up to his November dinner with U.S. investors in San Francisco.】

item.title: 泰国 2 月汽车产量同比下降 19.3%，原因是电动汽车进口和皮卡产量下降
item.description: 泰国工业联合会（Federation of Thai Industries）周二表示，泰国 2 月份的汽车产量同比下降了 19.28%，降至 133690 辆，这主要是由于皮卡产量下降和进口电动汽车（EV）增多。【原文：Car production in Thailand fell 19.28% in February from a year earlier to 133,690 units, the Federation of Thai Industries said on Tuesday, largely due to a decline in production of pickup trucks and more imported electric vehicles (EVs).】

item.title: 股市受制于利率风险；人民币摇摆不定
item.description: 亚洲股市周二攀升，但未能突破本月高点，原因是美国联邦储备委员会（U.S. Federal Reserve）政策制定者发出的信息好坏参半，令市场对降息时机产生疑虑。【原文：Asian equities climbed on Tuesday but could not break this month's highs as mixed messages from U.S. Federal Reserve policymakers left doubts hanging over the timing of interest rate cuts.】
